content.query:
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://kjastorage.dfs.core.windows.net/test/partitiontest/ORDERS/O_ORDERDATE=1992-01-01/part-00170-tid-3324066401681472990-a51d0461-15c2-4d2a-a8eb-1a648bc918bb-848-1.c000.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
